Index

B C D G H I L M O P R S T V 
All Classes All Packages

S

setHostName(String) - Method in class BlackJackClientController
setter for the host name string member since it is a private field
setIsGame(Boolean) - Method in class BlackJackClientController
setter for the isGame variable to be called when the application ends to stop the controller thread
slave - Variable in class BlackJackClientApp
Executor service slave thread to be used to run the client as a separate thread to implement the run method
start(Stage) - Method in class BlackJackClientApp
overridden start method to set up the GUI from the fxml file and also to start a thread pool with just the client thread from the controller object
startClient() - Method in class BlackJackClientController
method to start the client, this method will establish a connection with the server from the host provided by the hostName field, it will also open the object output and input streams for server client communication
startServer() - Method in class BlackJackServer
method to be called in the main method once the GUI is set up.
stayButton - Variable in class BlackJackClientController
stay button from the JavaFX GUI field
stayPressed(ActionEvent) - Method in class BlackJackClientController
on action method activated by the user pressing the stay Button, this will indicate the server to end the game summarize stats and then send them to the client to display in the gui
stop() - Method in class BlackJackClientApp
stop method to be called when the GUI is closed, this was overridden to end the controller object running thread and close the connection with the server
